title: Transportation secretary nominee vows to review SpaceX launch license fines
summary:
President-elect Trump’s pick to lead the Dept. of Transportation says he will review fines levied by the FAA against SpaceX for launch license violations.

title: 35 Years Ago: NASA Selects its 13th Group of Astronauts
summary: On Jan. 17, 1990, NASA announced the selection of its 13th group of astronaut candidates. The diverse group comprised 23 candidates – seven pilots and 16 mission specialists.
